text: Dedicate yourself to the good you deserve and desire for yourself. Give yourself peace of mind. You deserve to be happy. You deserve delight.
author: Hannah Arendt

text: There is no such thing as inner peace. There is only nervousness or death. Any attempt to prove otherwise constitutes unacceptable behavior.
author: Fran Lebowitz

text: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war.
author: Norman Schwarzkopf

text: Some men know that a light touch of the tongue, running from a woman's toes to her ears, lingering in the softest way possible in various places in between, given often enough and sincerely enough, would add immeasurably to world peace.
author: Marianne Williamson

text: There can never be peace between nations until there is first known that true peace which is within the souls of men.
author: Black Elk
